message.name: ERR_SERVICEROFFERING_FV_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: 'Name' must be entered.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEROFFERING_FV_NAME_SHORT
message.locale: The Name must contain at least %1n characters.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEROFFERING_FV_NAME_LONG
message.locale: Name must be less than or equal to %1n characters.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEROFFERING_INCL_IN_ACTIVE_SALI
message.locale: This service offering, %1s, is included in an 'Active' service authorization line item, it cannot be deleted
This service offering, %1s, is included in an 'Active' service authorisation line item, it cannot be deleted

message.name: ERR_SERVICEROFFERING_XRV_NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: The service offering, %1s , already exists.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEROFFERING_FV_DESCRIPTION_LONG
message.locale: Description must be less than or equal to %1n characters.

message.name: ERR_SO_XRV_ENDDATE_MUST_BE_LATER_THAN_OR_EQUAL_TO_LATEST_SR_EDATE
message.locale: The End Date must not be earlier than the End Date of the service rate, %1d.

message.name: ERR_SO_XRV_SDATE_MUST_BE_EARLIER_THAN_OR_EQUAL_TO_EARLIEST_SR_SDATE
message.locale: The Start Date must be on or before the Start Date of the service rate, %1d.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEROFFERING_XRV_STARTDATE_EARLIER_THAN_CURRENT_BUSINESS_DATE
message.locale: The Start Date must be on or after today.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEROFFERING_XRV_STARTDATE_CANNOT_MODIFIED_IF_SERVICEOFFERING_ASSOCIATED_WITH_PROVIDERS
message.locale: The Start Date cannot be modified as the service is associated with the following provider(s): %1s.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEROFFERING_FV_UNIT_OF_MEASURE_EMPTY
message.locale: 'Unit Of Measure' must be entered.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEROFFERING_FV_MAXIMUM_UNITS_NEGATIVE
message.locale: Maximum Units must be greater than zero.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEROFFERING_FV_UNITFREQUENCY_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED_IF_UNITS_SPECIFIED
message.locale: Unit Frequency must be entered if Maximum Units is entered.

message.name: ERR_SO_FV_UFREQUENCY_MUST_NOT_BE_SPECIFIED_IF_MUNITS_NOT_SPECIFIED
message.locale: Maximum Units must be entered if Unit Frequency is entered.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEROFFERING_FV_COMMENTS_LONG
message.locale: Comments must be less than or equal to %1n characters.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEROFFERING_XRV_ASSOCIATED_WITH_PROVIDER
message.locale: This service cannot be deleted as it is associated with the following provider(s): %1s.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEROFFERING_XRV_MUST_SPECIFY_SEARCH_CRITERIA
message.locale: Search Criteria must be specified.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEOFFERING_FV_MAX_UNITS_INVALID
message.locale: Maximum Units entered is invalid.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEOFFERING_THE_SERVICE_IS_NOT_ACTIVE_CANNOT_BE_SELECTED
message.locale: The service is not 'Active', it cannot be selected.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEOFFERING_XFV_UNIT_MUST_BE_PLACE_IF_PLACEMENTPMT_SET
message.locale: Placement Based Payment can be set to "Yes" only if the Unit of Measure is "Place".

message.name: INVALID_AMOUNT_PAYMENT_OPTION
message.locale: Invalid amount payment option data retrieved from the database

message.name: ERR_SERVICEOFFERING_XRV_STARTDATE_BEFORE_ORIGINAL_STARTDATE
message.locale: The service offering Start Date must be on or after the original Start Date, %1d.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEOFFERING_XRV_STARTDATE_BEFORE_ORIGINAL_STARTDATE_OR_CURRENTDATE
message.locale: The service offering Start Date must be on or after today's date or the original Start Date, %1d, whichever is earlier.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEOFFERING_XRV_SERVICEOFFERING_CANNOT_BE_DELETED_TRAINING_REQUIREMENT_EXISTS
message.locale: This training service, %1s, is an active training requirement, it cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEOFFERING_XRV_TRAINING_NAME_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED_TRAINING_RECORD_EXISTS
message.locale: This training service, %1s, is included on an 'Active' training program, Training Name cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEOFFERING_XRV_TRAINING_NAME_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED_TRAINING_REQUIREMENT_EXISTS
message.locale: This training service, %1s, is an active training requirement, Training Name cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEOFFERING_XRV_TRAINING_NAME_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED_PROVIDER_OFFERING_EXISTS
message.locale: This training service, %1s, is an active provider offering, Training Name cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEOFFERING_XRV_TRAINING_ALREADY_EXISTS_AS_TRAINING_SERVICE_CANNOT_CREATE_TRAINING_SERVICE_AGAIN
message.locale: This training, %1s, is already associated to an active service offering training. Training service, %2s, cannot be created with the same training.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEOFFERING_XRV_REGISTERED_TRAINING_OR_TRAINING_NAME_AND_TYPE_CAN_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Only one of either registered training or training name and type can be specified.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEOFFERING_XFV_REGISTERED_TRAINING_OR_TRAINING_NAME_AND_TYPE_EMPTY
message.locale: One of either registered training or training name and type must be specified.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEOFFERING_XFV_EITHER_SAPLMTINHIBITIND_OR_PLACEMENTPMTIND_CAN_BE_SET
message.locale: Only one of either Prevent Authorization Via Placement or Placement Based Payment can be set to "Yes".
Only one of either Prevent Authorisation Via Placement or Placement Based Payment can be set to "Yes".

message.name: ERR_SERVICEOFFERING_XFV_SAPLMTINHIBITIND_CANNOT_BE_SET_IF_PLACEMENTPMTIND_IS_SET
message.locale: Prevent Authorization Via Placement indicator cannot be set to "Yes" if the Pay Based on Placement indicator is set to "Yes".
Prevent Authorisation Via Placement indicator cannot be set to "Yes" if the Pay Based on Placement indicator is set to "Yes".

message.name: ERR_SERVICEOFFERING_XFV_EITHER_PLACEMENT_IND_OR_PAYATTENDANCE_CAN_BE_SET
message.locale: Only one of either Pay Based on Attendance or Pay Based on Placement indicator can be set to 'Yes'.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEOFFERING_XRV_TRAINING_DETAILS_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED_IF_PROVIDER_OFFERING_EXISTS
message.locale: This training service, %1s, is an active provider offering, Training Details cannot be modified.

message.name: TEXT_SERVICE_OFFERINGS
message.locale: Services

message.name: ERR_SERVICEOFFERING_XRV_SERVICE_OFFERING_CODE_MUST_BE_UNIQUE
message.locale: Service code, %1s , already exists.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEOFFERING_FV_SERVICE_OFFERING_CODE_LONG
message.locale: Service code must must be less than or equal to %1n characters.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEOFFERING_XFV_EITHER_REFERRAL_OR_SERVICE_DELIVERY_SELECTION_CAN_BE_SELECTED
message.locale: Only one of either Provision Method or Provider and Provider Type Selection can be specified.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEOFFERING_XFV_MULTIPLE_SEARCH_CRITERIA_ENTERED
message.locale: Only one of either service search criteria or service group search criteria must be entered.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEROFFERING_XRV_REFERENCE_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: The reference, %1s, already exists.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEOFFERING_FV_REFERENCE_MUST_NOT_CONTAIN_BLANK_SPACES
message.locale: If entered, Reference must not contain blank spaces.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEOFFERING_XRV_REFERENCE_DOES_NOT_EXIST
message.locale: Service with the given reference, %1s, does not exist.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEOFFERING_FV_UPPERNAME_EXCEEDED_LIMIT
message.locale: Service name exceeds the max length. Maximum limit is %1n characters.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEOFFERING_FV_REFERENCE_LONG
message.locale: Reference must be less than or equal to %1n characters.
